title: Eliseo Álvarez
text:
Eliseo Álvarez (9 August 1940 – 1999) was an <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>an <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who played for <a href="Uruguay%20national%20football%20team">Uruguay</a> in the <a href="1962%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1962</a> and <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966 FIFA World Cup</a>s. He also played for <a href="Club%20Nacional%20de%20Football">Club Nacional de Football</a> and <a href="Rampla%20Juniors">Rampla Juniors</a>. 
In Argentina, he played for <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Banfield">Banfield</a> and <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Platense">Platense</a>.
